backend/main.mo: Implements access‑controlled user profiles and per‑user manga CRUD storage using Map structures and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata linking features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls auth flow, profile setup, and renders manga list with loading and initialization checks.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with state handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time profile creation with name input and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper with header, footer, and containerized main content.
frontend/src/components/manga/ADD_MANGA_: Checklist documenting expected Add Manga dialog layout behavior and regression tests for scrolling and fixed header/footer.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: Dialog component for creating a manga entry, handling form state, validation, backend readiness, and submission.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: Handles uploading, previewing, and removing cover images with progress tracking.
Displays a compact manga summary card with cover, titles, rating, progress, status, and genres.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Main manga list view handling pagination, actor readiness states, error handling, and add‑manga dialog control.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Renders numbered pagination buttons with ellipsis logic and next/previous controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Extends actor handling with readiness checks, retry logic, and combined connection/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Fetches all manga entries gated by actor readiness, authentication, and retryable error logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Implements a readiness check using react-query with retry/backoff, tracking backend connection state and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and update the caller’s user profile, gated on backend readiness and actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Derives a sorted unique list of genres from all manga entries, memoized for performance.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Provides add, update, and delete mutations for manga entries with backend readiness checks and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaPage.ts: Fetches a paginated manga page, requiring authentication, backend readiness, and retrying transient errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorClassific: Classifies backend errors into categories, determines retryability, and provides user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/retryBackoff.ts: Implements bounded exponential backoff utilities and a retry manager for async operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project's current state metadata, including features implemented, versioning, and summaries for build and planning use.
